game_description: Fear2Fly provides virtual flying experience for user who want to test if they are afraid of such kind of environment. The application contains different scenarios including walk-in cabin, flight ascending and descending scene. Free to download and allow trial users to test the application with default scenarios. Monthly subscribed user can play more customized scenarios (seating, weather, cabin-steadiness) on different situations and play records management. With record management capability, subscribed users can upload their play records for later review over web-login and print out the records history to seek professional help. Monthly subscription can be done via in-app purchase.
